dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 20 Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
Articlelnsider.com
5/18/2005
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc. 4086 Del Rey Ave.
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private] Fax: [private]
Attn: [private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com


Incident#1
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "The Ease of Blackjack Betting Online" by Tom Powell posted on the Article Insider web site at http://onlinegambling.articleinsider.com/104638 blackjack_betting online.html
Search Query: "Online casinos host legitimate gaming that includes blackjack." Infringing Web Pages: http://gamblingmagazine.com/ManageArticle.asp?C=500&A=11512
My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com 
Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 
Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]


Incident#2
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Why You Need Online Casino Data" by Dan Mintz posted on the Article Insider web site at http://onlinegambling.articleinsider.com/16354 online casino data.html
Search Query: "Yet unless you live in Las Vegas or Atlantic City, gambling may seem to be more trouble than it's worth."
Infringing Web Pages: ham://www.reviewed-internet-gambling.com/internet-
